entry.title: Desperation Mounts for Ukrainians in Mariupol as Russia Tries to Capture Key City
entry.content: Rescuers dug through the debris of a bombed theater where hundreds of civilians had sought shelter as Russian forces continued to shell the southern port city and other urban areas across the country.

entry.title: How Marina Ovsyannikova Became Russia's Most Visible Antiwar Protester
entry.content: The television producer for Russia’s flagship news show, who brandished an antiwar poster on state TV, says the invasion of Ukraine was something she couldn’t tolerate.

entry.title: How Russia's Revamped Military Fumbled the Invasion of Ukraine
entry.content: Moscow spent years and billions upgrading its capabilities, only to see the armed forces fail their first major test, confounding earlier Western assessments and giving Ukraine a boost. ‘For now, they just can’t move.’
